content: {"locationId": "7809", "organizationId": "6495", "name": "Zion AME Food Distribution Center", "address1": "62 Ritter Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Yemassee", "state": "SC", "zipCode": "29945", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "32.7714546", "longitude": "-80.7126966", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Our Distribution Center is located in Colleton County off of 17A or Green Pond Hwy, depending on which way you are traveling.", "notes": "The Distribution Center is open the 2nd and 4th Fridays of each month, unless it is a Holiday and/or the Yemassee office is closed.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "843-562-6300", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "Clothing Program, Utility Assistance", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 56, "regionName": "Lowcountry Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "5fb3a382-bcd1-479f-a540-43f27ab71b53.png", "website": "https://lowcountryfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)", "None-None (Call for Information)", "Sunday 12:00 PM-1:00 PM", "Sunday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Monday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Thursday 10:00 AM-11:00 AM", "Friday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Saturday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
